Édémédé akachasị gụọ

Super Bowl XXX – Tekno (musician) – Arise O Compatriots, Nigeria's Call Obey – Fasil Assefa – Faith Kipyegon – Iri Ji ọhụrụ ndi Igbo – India – Germany – Àlà – Ábu – Canada – Igbo calendar – Federal Kọleji nke Mmụta Alvan Ikoku – Albania – Ọrụ Aka – Oru ugbo – Ejiji omenala Igbo – Vincent van Gogh – Egypt – Johann Sebastian Bach


Édémédé egosipụtara

Dora Nkem Akunyili (amụrụ ya na abali 14 n'ọnwa asaa n-afọ 1954 – ya anwụọ n'abali asaa n'ọnwa isii na-afọ 2014). Ọ bụ onye Ntụziaka nke Ụlọ-ọru ndi (Director General) National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) nile di na Naijiria. Bụkwara Onye isi Mgbasaozi nke ala Naijiria (Nigerian Minister of Information and Communications) site na-afọ 2008 ruo 2010.

Ọ bụ onye Ntọ Ọgwụ nke ndi bekee na-akpọ Pharmacist nakwa onye Ọrụ Gọvament ama-ama na mba ụwa tinyekwara n'onwetara ọtụtụ inwe site n'ọrụ ya 'Pharmacology', 'Public Health' na 'Human Rights
Hụ édémédé ndị ọzọ egosipụtara

Foto egosipụtara

Ọjà bụ ngwa egwu si n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke a na-ejikarị ngwa ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ dị ka ekwe, udu, igba, okwa na ichaka/osha eji agu egwu. Ngwá egwú a pụrụ iche ‘na-ekwu okwu’ ka ndị na-akụ egwu na ndị na-agba egwú, na-agba egwu. N'oge a na-agba egwu mmawu na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, onye ọfụfụ oja na-edu egwu na abụ otuto. Onye isi ofufu ọjà na-enwe ike iwepụta ọtụtụ ụda dị ka okwu ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na onye dị mkpa abanye n'ime oghere igba egwu, onye n'afu ọjà nwere ike iji ngwá egwu a kpọsaa aha onye ahụ.

Lee fòtó ndị ọzọ na Commons.
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwèrè Árò, édémédé, mà ọ bụ foto ị choro kà egosi na peeji à, biko depụta ha ebe à

Ị mà na...
  • Igbo hailaif malitere mbụ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, n'oge 1950
  • Ikwokirikwo (Ikwokilikwo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu nke na-emetụta Ogene, Ụdị a pụtara na mbido 1970s.
  • Egwu Atilogwu so na egwu ọdịnala a na-agba na Enugu Steeti
  • Bongo Owerri (Bongo/Bongo Igbo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu sitere na ndị Igbo bi na Owerri.
  • Odumodu bụ ụdị egwu ndị mmadụ si Arochukwu, Bende, Ohafia, Abiriba, Umuahia, Ikwuano, na Ngwa ndị Igbo, nke Abia steeti.
  • Egwu Egedege bụ otu n'ime ekike egwu ọdịnala ama ama na egwu ọdịnala ndị eze nke Igbo na-eme na Anambra.
  • Egwu Agbachaekurunwa bụ ihe eji mara ndi Ụmụcho Ụmụediabali Ihitteaforukwu Ahịa azụ Mbaise n'Imo Steeti.
  • Agborogwụ ma ọ bụ Ekereavụ bụ egwu eji mara Ogorinawuibe, Umumbiri Oparanadim Ekwerazu, Ahịa azụ Mbaise n'Imo steeti
  • Egwu MMỤTAKA bụ egwu ndi obodo Ubaha nke di n' Umunze Anambra Steeti. Egwu a si n' egwu a na-akpo Mkpọkịtị wee pụta
  • Ndị ọzọ bụ rap Igbo, Ekpili, Ogene, gospel Igbo, Ikorodo, wdg
    Gaa n'ihu ịgụ édémédé à

Árò gị
Ị nwèrè árò, édémédé mà ọ bụ foto ị chọrọ ka egosi n'ihụ mbụ à, biko gbaa mbò ka ị depụta, kọwaa na tinye njikọ há na peeji ákụkọ à
Hụ édémédé na foto ndị ọzọ egosiri n'ihu mbụ a

Ị na-agụ, na-ede, na-atụgharịkwa asụsụ igbo? Anyị chọrọ enyemaka gị!

Anyị jikọta ákà ọnụ, anyị ga emepụta ihe dị ukwu!

Ọ bụ onye Ntọ Ọgwụ nke ndi bekee na-akpọ Pharmacist nakwa onye Ọrụ Gọvament ama-ama na mba ụwa tinyekwara n'onwetara ọtụtụ inwe site n'ọrụ ya 'Pharmacology', 'Public Health' na 'Human Rights
Hụ édémédé ndị ọzọ egosipụtara

Foto egosipụtara

Ọjà bụ ngwa egwu si n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke a na-ejikarị ngwa ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ dị ka ekwe, udu, igba, okwa na ichaka/osha eji agu egwu. Ngwá egwú a pụrụ iche ‘na-ekwu okwu’ ka ndị na-akụ egwu na ndị na-agba egwú, na-agba egwu. N'oge a na-agba egwu mmawu na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, onye ọfụfụ oja na-edu egwu na abụ otuto. Onye isi ofufu ọjà na-enwe ike iwepụta ọtụtụ ụda dị ka okwu ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na onye dị mkpa abanye n'ime oghere igba egwu, onye n'afu ọjà nwere ike iji ngwá egwu a kpọsaa aha onye ahụ.

Lee fòtó ndị ọzọ na Commons.
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwèrè Árò, édémédé, mà ọ bụ foto ị choro kà egosi na peeji à, biko depụta ha ebe à

Ị mà na...
  • Igbo hailaif malitere mbụ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, n'oge 1950
  • Ikwokirikwo (Ikwokilikwo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu nke na-emetụta Ogene, Ụdị a pụtara na mbido 1970s.
  • Egwu Atilogwu so na egwu ọdịnala a na-agba na Enugu Steeti
  • Bongo Owerri (Bongo/Bongo Igbo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu sitere na ndị Igbo bi na Owerri.
  • Odumodu bụ ụdị egwu ndị mmadụ si Arochukwu, Bende, Ohafia, Abiriba, Umuahia, Ikwuano, na Ngwa ndị Igbo, nke Abia steeti.
  • Egwu Egedege bụ otu n'ime ekike egwu ọdịnala ama ama na egwu ọdịnala ndị eze nke Igbo na-eme na Anambra.
  • Egwu Agbachaekurunwa bụ ihe eji mara ndi Ụmụcho Ụmụediabali Ihitteaforukwu Ahịa azụ Mbaise n'Imo Steeti.
  • Agborogwụ ma ọ bụ Ekereavụ bụ egwu eji mara Ogorinawuibe, Umumbiri Oparanadim Ekwerazu, Ahịa azụ Mbaise n'Imo steeti
  • Egwu MMỤTAKA bụ egwu ndi obodo Ubaha nke di n' Umunze Anambra Steeti. Egwu a si n' egwu a na-akpo Mkpọkịtị wee pụta
  • Ndị ọzọ bụ rap Igbo, Ekpili, Ogene, gospel Igbo, Ikorodo, wdg
    Gaa n'ihu ịgụ édémédé à

Árò gị
Ị nwèrè árò, édémédé mà ọ bụ foto ị chọrọ ka egosi n'ihụ mbụ à, biko gbaa mbò ka ị depụta, kọwaa na tinye njikọ há na peeji ákụkọ à
Hụ édémédé na foto ndị ọzọ egosiri n'ihu mbụ a

Ọ gadi nma ka immepe ihuakwukwọ ma tinye akara nbanye, mana ọ bụghị iwu.
Anyi si ka Í gbanyé; chetákwá na nsogbu adighi I gbanye ma Í chógị gbànyé [o]
Akíkó maka ihe di na ihü nka [t]

Ihu â dị̀ ǹchèdò.
Ị nwẹ̀rẹ̀ ike ị hụ mkpụrụ ya [e]
Détụ ihü wiki nílé na ga ngà [j]
Ihe gbanwere na ihü jikodọrọ na ihü nke nà ógè nso [k]
Jikodo nke dìrì e dí nke na gá ngbàzì ihü nka
Ùmà màkà otụ ha shi ạ dépùtà ihe na ihüa
Ihü nka nke Í nweríkí dótù [p]

[![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Purple-bg_rounded.svg/350px-Purple-bg_rounded.svg.png)](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fd/HSutvald2.svg/40px-HSutvald2.svg.png) Édémédé egosipụtara [![Dora Akunyili](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/DoraAkunyili_Monument_at_Ezinano_Agulu.jpg/250px-DoraAkunyili_Monument_at_Ezinano_Agulu.jpg)](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:DoraAkunyili_Monument_at_Ezinano_Agulu.jpg "Dora Akunyili")Dora Akunyili **[Dora Nkem Akunyili](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dora_Akunyili "Dora Akunyili")** (amụrụ ya na abali 14 n'ọnwa asaa n-afọ 1954 – ya anwụọ n'abali asaa n'ọnwa isii na-afọ 2014). Ọ bụ onye Ntụziaka nke Ụlọ-ọru ndi (Director General) National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) nile di na Naijiria. Bụkwara Onye isi Mgbasaozi nke ala Naijiria (Nigerian Minister of Information and Communications) site na-afọ 2008 ruo 2010.  Ọ bụ onye Ntọ Ọgwụ nke ndi bekee na-akpọ Pharmacist nakwa onye Ọrụ Gọvament ama-ama na mba ụwa tinyekwara n'onwetara ọtụtụ inwe site n'ọrụ ya 'Pharmacology', 'Public Health' na 'Human Rights[Hụ édémédé ndị ọzọ egosipụtara](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:%C3%89d%C3%A9m%C3%A9d%C3%A9_na_foto_egosip%E1%BB%A5tara) [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Purple-bg_rounded.svg/350px-Purple-bg_rounded.svg.png)](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/Circle-icons-image.svg/40px-Circle-icons-image.svg.png) Foto egosipụtara [![Ọjà](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8d/Oja.jpg/250px-Oja.jpg)](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Oja.jpg "Ọjà")Ọjà **[Ọjà](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E1%BB%8Cj%C3%A0_\(ngwa_egwu\) "Ọjà \(ngwa egwu\)")** bụ ngwa egwu si n'ọwụwa anyanwụ [Naijiria](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naijiria "Naijiria") nke a na-ejikarị ngwa ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ dị ka ekwe, udu, igba, okwa na ichaka/osha eji agu egwu. Ngwá egwú a pụrụ iche ‘na-ekwu okwu’ ka ndị na-akụ egwu na ndị na-agba egwú, na-agba egwu. N'oge a na-agba egwu mmawu na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, onye ọfụfụ oja na-edu egwu na abụ otuto. Onye isi ofufu ọjà na-enwe ike iwepụta ọtụtụ ụda dị ka okwu ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na onye dị mkpa abanye n'ime oghere igba egwu, onye n'afu ọjà nwere ike iji ngwá egwu a kpọsaa aha onye ahụ.  [Lee fòtó ndị ọzọ na Commons](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Flutes).Ọ bụrụ na ị nwèrè Árò, édémédé, mà ọ bụ foto ị choro kà egosi na peeji à, biko depụta ha [ebe à](https://ig.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Okwu_Wikipedia%3A%C3%89d%C3%A9m%C3%A9d%C3%A9_na_foto_egosip%E1%BB%A5tara#Aro_%E1%BB%8Bhu_mb%E1%BB%A5) [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Purple-bg_rounded.svg/350px-Purple-bg_rounded.svg.png)](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Blue_question_mark_icon.svg/40px-Blue_question_mark_icon.svg.png) Ị mà na...   * [Igbo hailaif](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Igbo_highlife "Igbo highlife") malitere mbụ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, n'oge 1950
  * Ikwokirikwo (Ikwokilikwo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu nke na-emetụta Ogene, Ụdị a pụtara na mbido 1970s.
  * Egwu [Atilogwu](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atilogwu "Atilogwu") so na egwu ọdịnala a na-agba na [Enugu Steeti](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/En%E1%BB%A5gw%E1%BB%A5 "Enụgwụ")
  * Bongo Owerri (Bongo/Bongo Igbo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu sitere na ndị Igbo bi na [Owerri](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Owerri "Owerri").
  * Odumodu bụ ụdị egwu ndị mmadụ si [Arochukwu](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arochukwu "Arochukwu"), [Bende](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bende "Bende"), [Ohafia](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ohafia "Ohafia"), [Abiriba](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abiriba "Abiriba"), [Umuahia](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umuahia "Umuahia"), [Ikwuano](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ikwuano "Ikwuano"), na Ngwa ndị Igbo, nke [Abia steeti](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abia_State "Abia State").
  * [Egwu Egedege](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egedege_Dance "Egedege Dance") bụ otu n'ime ekike egwu ọdịnala ama ama na egwu ọdịnala ndị eze nke Igbo na-eme na [Anambra](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anambra_Steeti "Anambra Steeti").
  * [Egwu Agbachaekurunwa](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egwu_Agbachaekurunwa "Egwu Agbachaekurunwa") bụ ihe eji mara ndi Ụmụcho Ụmụediabali Ihitteaforukwu Ahịa azụ [Mbaise](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mbaise "Mbaise") [n'Imo Steeti](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imo_State "Imo State").
  * [Agborogwụ ma ọ bụ Ekereavụ](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egwu_Akporogwu/Ekperavu "Egwu Akporogwu/Ekperavu") bụ egwu eji mara Ogorinawuibe, Umumbiri Oparanadim Ekwerazu, Ahịa azụ Mbaise n'Imo steeti
  * [Egwu MMỤTAKA](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egwu_MM%E1%BB%A4TAKA "Egwu MMỤTAKA") bụ egwu ndi obodo Ubaha nke di n' Umunze Anambra Steeti. Egwu a si n' egwu a na-akpo Mkpọkịtị wee pụta
  * Ndị ọzọ bụ rap Igbo, Ekpili, Ogene, gospel Igbo, Ikorodo, wdg[Gaa n'ihu ịgụ édémédé à ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Igbo_music)

![⟨62⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fd/HSutvald2.svg/40px-HSutvald2.svg.png) Édémédé egosipụtara ![Dora Akunyili⟨63⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:DoraAkunyili_Monument_at_Ezinano_Agulu.jpg "Dora Akunyili")Dora Akunyili **Dora Nkem Akunyili⟨64⟩** (amụrụ ya na abali 14 n'ọnwa asaa n-afọ 1954 – ya anwụọ n'abali asaa n'ọnwa isii na-afọ 2014). Ọ bụ onye Ntụziaka nke Ụlọ-ọru ndi (Director General) National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) nile di na Naijiria. Bụkwara Onye isi Mgbasaozi nke ala Naijiria (Nigerian Minister of Information and Communications) site na-afọ 2008 ruo 2010.  Ọ bụ onye Ntọ Ọgwụ nke ndi bekee na-akpọ Pharmacist nakwa onye Ọrụ Gọvament ama-ama na mba ụwa tinyekwara n'onwetara ọtụtụ inwe site n'ọrụ ya 'Pharmacology', 'Public Health' na 'Human RightsHụ édémédé ndị ọzọ egosipụtara⟨65⟩ ![⟨62⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/Circle-icons-image.svg/40px-Circle-icons-image.svg.png) Foto egosipụtara ![Ọjà⟨66⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Oja.jpg "Ọjà")Ọjà **Ọjà⟨67⟩ "Ọjà \(ngwa egwu\)")** bụ ngwa egwu si n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria⟨68⟩ nke a na-ejikarị ngwa ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ dị ka ekwe, udu, igba, okwa na ichaka/osha eji agu egwu. Ngwá egwú a pụrụ iche ‘na-ekwu okwu’ ka ndị na-akụ egwu na ndị na-agba egwú, na-agba egwu. N'oge a na-agba egwu mmawu na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, onye ọfụfụ oja na-edu egwu na abụ otuto. Onye isi ofufu ọjà na-enwe ike iwepụta ọtụtụ ụda dị ka okwu ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na onye dị mkpa abanye n'ime oghere igba egwu, onye n'afu ọjà nwere ike iji ngwá egwu a kpọsaa aha onye ahụ.  Lee fòtó ndị ọzọ na Commons⟨69⟩.Ọ bụrụ na ị nwèrè Árò, édémédé, mà ọ bụ foto ị choro kà egosi na peeji à, biko depụta ha ebe à⟨70⟩ ![⟨62⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Purple-bg_rounded.svg "Green-bg rounded.svg=") ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/Blue_question_mark_icon.svg/40px-Blue_question_mark_icon.svg.png) Ị mà na... ![Otu Umu Nwanyi⟨71⟩](https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fa%E1%BB%8Bl%E1%BB%A5:Nkwa_group,_Adorable_Daugthers_of_Divine_Love.jpg "Otu Umu Nwanyi")Otu Umu Nwanyi
  * Igbo hailaif⟨72⟩ malitere mbụ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, n'oge 1950
  * Ikwokirikwo (Ikwokilikwo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu nke na-emetụta Ogene, Ụdị a pụtara na mbido 1970s.
  * Egwu Atilogwu⟨73⟩ so na egwu ọdịnala a na-agba na Enugu Steeti⟨74⟩
  * Bongo Owerri (Bongo/Bongo Igbo) bụ ụdị egwu Igbo dị elu sitere na ndị Igbo bi na Owerri⟨75⟩.
  * Odumodu bụ ụdị egwu ndị mmadụ si Arochukwu⟨76⟩, Bende⟨77⟩, Ohafia⟨78⟩, Abiriba⟨79⟩, Umuahia⟨80⟩, Ikwuano⟨81⟩, na Ngwa ndị Igbo, nke Abia steeti⟨82⟩.
